tooltip.ancientmagicks.witch_arrow: Launches a damaging magical arrow that flies towards enemies.
tooltip.ancientmagicks.fireball: Launches a fiery orb that explodes into flames upon collision.
tooltip.ancientmagicks.telekinetic_grab: Pulls targeted dropped items towards you.
tooltip.ancientmagicks.fly: Grants target the ability to fly for a short period.
tooltip.ancientmagicks.summon_zombie: Summons a subservient Undead creature to fight for you.
tooltip.ancientmagicks.blink: Teleports you a short distance forwards.
tooltip.ancientmagicks.wind_burst: Causes a sudden burst of wind to blow past you and towards where you're looking at moving ANYONE caught in it.
tooltip.ancientmagicks.frost_armor: Grants a protective shield that slows attackers. You can only have one Armor Spell active at once.
tooltip.ancientmagicks.call_thunder: Directs a powerful lightning strike towards where you're looking. The lightning will always hit a surface.
tooltip.ancientmagicks.polymorph: Transforms a target into a harmless sheep. If the effect runs out or if the sheep takes damage it's transformed back into its original form.
tooltip.ancientmagicks.chaotic_polymorph: Transforms a target into another RANDOM creature. This transformation is not reversible.
tooltip.ancientmagicks.feather_fall: Grants all nearby targets slower falling speed.
tooltip.ancientmagicks.numb_pain: Numbs all pain from target preventing all damage taken. Damage taken is stored and dealt after the effect ends if it would be lethal.
tooltip.ancientmagicks.alacrity: Hastens target causing them to momentarily do most actions faster.
tooltip.ancientmagicks.spook: Silences all footsteps from a target and prevents non-lethal falling damage.
tooltip.ancientmagicks.greater_invisibil: Grants greater invisibility to a target. Hides all worn equipment, held items and running particles but is dispelled after attacking.
tooltip.ancientmagicks.ice_wall: Channel a stream of frost to build up walls of ice.
tooltip.ancientmagicks.mind_control: Forces a target to fight for you momentarily.
tooltip.ancientmagicks.blizzard: Channel to conjure an ice storm to damage and slow enemies in an area you're targeting.
tooltip.ancientmagicks.dragon_breath: Channel to spew out damaging dragon flames.
tooltip.ancientmagicks.summon_death_knig: Summons a subservient Death Knight to fight for you. It can survive lethal damage once.
tooltip.ancientmagicks.water_bolt: Launches a projectile made of water that bounces from walls and other surfaces and damages hit enemies.
tooltip.ancientmagicks.vermin_bane: Channel to spew forth a mist that damages only arthropods.
tooltip.ancientmagicks.darkvision: Enables a target to see clearly in the dark.
tooltip.ancientmagicks.freeze_lance: Launches a piercing lance that damages and slows enemies.
tooltip.ancientmagicks.burn_lance: Launches a piercing lance that damages and burns enemies.
tooltip.ancientmagicks.teleblock: Prevent a target from teleporting for a short duration.
tooltip.ancientmagicks.fire_bolt: Launches a small fiery bolt that damages and burns hit enemies.
tooltip.ancientmagicks.fire_breath: Channel to spew out damaging flames.
tooltip.ancientmagicks.summon_bees: Summons bees to fight for you.
tooltip.ancientmagicks.acid_arrow: Launches a caustic magical damaging arrow.
tooltip.ancientmagicks.witch_armor: Grants a shield that uses mana to block damage. You can only have one Armor Spell active at once.
tooltip.ancientmagicks.life_tap: Convert some of your health into mana.
tooltip.ancientmagicks.perfect_invisibil: Perfectly conceals target from the world.
tooltip.ancientmagicks.summon_skeleton_w: Summons a subservient Skeleton Warrior to fight for you.
tooltip.ancientmagicks.summon_skeleton_c: Summons a subservient Skeleton Caster to aid you in battle.
message.ancientmagicks.no_xp_to_learn_sp: You don't have enough experience to learn that spell
